text: Aur ailaan ker dey kay yeh sirasar bar-haq quran tumharay rab ki taraf say hai. Abb jo chahaye eman laye aur jo chahaye kufur keray. Zalimon kay liye hum ney woh aag tayyar ker rakhi hai jiss ki qanaten unhen gher len gi agar woh faryad rasi chahayen gay to unn ki faryad rasi uss pani say ki jayegi jo tel ki talchat jaisa hoga jo chehray bhoon dey ga bara hi bura pani hai aur bari buri aaram gaah (dozakh) hai
